snippet.title: PODCAST: With Scott Morrison on Amazon, fintech, and meeting bank CEOs lately
snippet.content:
The Australian dollar seems to have found a new level, up around US80c.
The major banks are being pressured to had over their data to customers.
Property prices in the major cities are high, and wages growth sucks around the country. Amazon is setting up shop in the retail sector, and it's looking like it'll have a profound effect on retail.
To discuss it all we're joined on the podcast this week by the federal treasurer, Scott Morrison.
You can find the show on iTunes, or listen in below. Enjoy!
